EmailTemplate.name: 31OctWeb-SOW.SOW Guide Follow-Up
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}}, your SOW guide is ready
EmailTemplate.textOnly: {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}}, As a follow up to our SOW webinar held on October 31st, I would like you to be one of the first to view our new downloadable guide, "Scoping Out the Statement of Work <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/Statement-Scope-of-Work-2013.pdf>." In it, you'll find out the difference between the terms Scope and Statement, why you need a strong SOW, and tips and strategies to create your own. You'll also find an SOW checklist and a customizable template to help you get started. Get the full guide <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/Statement-Scope-of-Work-2013.pdf> today! ___________________________________ Jaime MacDonell Marketing Manager MBO Partners t: 703-793-6368 e: jmacdonell@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
